response.overview: Jessica knows all about motivating her salesmen, and one lucky salesman gets to know all about Jessica's pervy methods. Chris took pictures of Phoenix masturbating at work with his phone. Now she's willing to do whatever it takes for him to erase the pictures. A coworker's ploy has Blake thinking he's the humanitarian of the year. The only question is, will he be able to keep it up. Madison gets caught showing off her privates and wants to make sure the evidence doesn't leave the room.
response.title: Dirty Office Flings 3
